item.title: CPAL automatization
item.description: CPAL automatization Context The Centro Peruano de Audici√≥n, Lenguaje y Aprendizaje (CPAL) had a bad user experience on its website, one of de main problems was the procedure to find the triage button, complete de form button and waitting for specialist’s response that takes one or two weeks. Other main problem was As part of the UX , it was required to make a system that manages the input of information from users and its subsequent analysis.
